channel.title: npm on KHTDR.com
channel.description: Recent content in npm on KHTDR.com

item.title: react-zondicons
item.description: A dependency-free, small, fast, good-looking React SVG icon set. See: http://khtdr.com/react-zondicons/ for installation, usage, documentation, and examples.

item.title: opts.js
item.description: opts.js is a Javascript helper library for command-line applications, for accepting and parsing command-line arguments,flags and options, and automatically generating a useful help message. Introduction to Opts.js Why choose opts.js over something bigger and better? Small : Under 10kb, uncompressed. Stable : Relatively unchanged since 2010. See changelog. Standalone : No package manager necessary, no compiling needed. See src/opts.js. Tested : Millions of downloads per year.
